patthana16.38:4.1: Hīnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahīno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.38:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke aṭṭha … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.38:5.1: Hīnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namajjhimo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.38:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke cha … pe … avigate nava.
